content:
--- title: Aircraft Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-04-10T09:18:56.091Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T12:35:37.802Z --- # Aircraft Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Retrieve records where `SCHEDOPS.aircraft.LAST_UPDATE` > Last Data Retrieval Date #### - Source Query * `Riverx_Aircraft_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger:** Every 6 hours **Steps:** Execute `Riverx_Aircraft_Query` query. #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: A composite key, combining `SCHEDOPS.aircraft.registration` and `SCHEDOPS.aircraft.VALID_SINCE`. * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed, as the source system does not delete Aircraft records. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |regId|`SCHEDOPS.aircraft`|`registration`| | |startDate|`SCHEDOPS.aircraft`|`VALID_SINCE`| | |endDate|`SCHEDOPS.aircraft`|`VALID_UNTIL`| | |acType| | |N/A in the source system.| |subtype|`SCHEDOPS.aircraft`|`AC_SUBTYPE_NAME`| | |customizedType|`SCHEDOPS.aircraft`|`AC_SUBTYPE`| | |nameOfAircraft| | |N/A in the source system.| |numberOfSeats|`SCHEDOPS.AC_VERSION_COMP acv`,
`SCHEDOPS.aircraft ac`|`ac.ac_subtype`, `ac.std_version`,
`acv.ac_subtype`, `acv.ac_version`,
`acv.CURTAIN_VERSION`, `acv.seats`|when `ac.ac_subtype` = `acv.ac_subtype` and `ac.std_version` = `acv.ac_version` and
`acv.CURTAIN_VERSION` is null
then sum(`acv.seats`)| |registrar| | |N/A in the source system.| |owner|`SCHEDOPS.aircraft`|`ac_owner`| | |contract|`SCHEDOPS.aircraft`|`ac_owner`, `AC_OPERATOR`|when `ac_owner` <> (“XG” or “XQ”) and `AC_OPERATOR` <>(“XG” or “XQ”) then “WETLEASE“ else “DRYLEASE“| |phoneNumber|`SCHEDOPS.aircraft`|`PHONE`| | # Aircraft Rotation Data Model > Not implemented… {.is-info} ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope #### - Source Service #### - Source Query #### - Data Retrieval Trigge
